entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #48109
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext, single_query #48108
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #48107
  • Change access modifier of ForceSignOut() to protected virtual for improved extensibility and custom exception handling #48101
  • Conditional onparamterasync #48100
  • How to accept a client certificate signed by an untrusted CA in Asp .netcore? #48099

Closed

  • Perf regression: caching, updates #48018
  • Perf regression: https, mvc #48078
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes_ef #48092
  • Failed to establish TLS connection to grpc streaming service #47702
  • Blazor WebAssembly build error #48044
  • Perf regression: mvc #48093
  • Output Cache doesn't work when user has Cookie Authentication cookies #48025
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Append values to collections #47896
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2175168 #48106
    area-mvc
  • Fix StackOverflowException in RoutePatternAnalyzer #48105
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Change access modifier of ForceSignOut() #48102
    area-blazor, community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Use ObjectCreationHandling.Populate in gRPC JSON transcoding #48084
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • http.sys (6.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48072
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • http.sys (7.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48073
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Add MediaTypeHeaderValue parsing overloads accepting IList of StringSegment #48035
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use Node 18 (LTS) #48087
    area-infrastructure
